sentences.en: an empty bottle
sentences.cn: 空瓶子

sentences.en: an empty box
sentences.cn: 空盒子

sentences.en: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.cn: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.en: Chang seemed surprised to find the big living-room empty.
sentences.cn: 张看到偌大的客厅里空无一人，似乎很惊讶。

sentences.en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentences.cn: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

sentences.en: Empty the noodles and liquid into a serving bowl.
sentences.cn: 把汤面倒进上菜用的碗中。

sentences.en: He fixed me with those luminous, empty eyes and his melancholy smile.
sentences.cn: 他笑容忧郁地凝视着我，闪亮的眼睛里空无一物。

sentences.en: He smiles and swirls the ice ruminatively around his almost empty glass.
sentences.cn: 他微笑着，一边沉思，一边搅动着几乎空了的杯子里的冰块。

sentences.en: Her parting words left him feeling empty and alone.
sentences.cn: 她分手时说的话让他感觉空虚孤独。

sentences.en: His voice sounded oddly resonant in the empty room.
sentences.cn: 他的声音在这空荡荡的房间里听起来异常嘹亮。

sentences.en: I emptied the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 我倒空了烟灰缸。

sentences.en: My life was very hectic but empty before I met him.
sentences.cn: 在遇到他之前，我的生活非常繁忙却很空虚。

sentences.en: On the table beside an empty plate was a pile of books.
sentences.cn: 桌上空盘子的旁边是一堆书。

sentences.en: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentences.cn: 她带他参观了这处空房子的底楼。

sentences.en: She went to the sink and ran water into her empty glass.
sentences.cn: 她走到水槽边，把空玻璃杯灌上水。

sentences.en: The fuel tank’s almost empty.
sentences.cn: 燃油箱快要空了。

sentences.en: The room was empty apart from one man seated beside the fire.
sentences.cn: 除了有个男人坐在火炉边，房间里空荡荡的。

sentences.en: The stadium will be as near as dammit empty.
sentences.cn: 体育场里将几乎空无一人。

sentences.en: There were two empty beer bottles on the table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有两个空啤酒瓶。

sentences.en: They're just empty promises. ＃
sentences.cn: 这些承诺只不过是些空头支票。

sentences.en: We were given an office in the empty west wing.
sentences.cn: 给我们在空置的大楼西翼分了一间办公室。

words.tran_cn: 使成为空的；倒出（empty的现在分词）
空的;无人居住的;空白的;空洞的

phrases.tran_cn: 空巢；空巢期；儿女长大离家
真空，真空区；架空层；空档

phrases.phrase: empty vessels make most noise ( 或 sound)

trans.tran_cn: 空的，无意义的，空虚的，无力的

trans.tran_en: If you empty a container, or empty something out of it, you remove its contents, especially by tipping it up
to remove everything that is inside something
